long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will save you time. It's a fact :) two in one.
1. Compare the real <title> tag of website to the one you see in the SERP (in one click OR in auto-mode).
2. See the "position number" of each result, it should save you at least a few minutes a day ;-)

Compare the titles in one click and improve your results based on competitors mistakes :)

UPDATES: 
Nov 14, 2023
- Updated to support the new Google SERP layout.

Jul 7, 2022
- Support black-mode in browser
- Menu is more clear about the "auto-mode"
- Auto-mode is active by default
